@Component
public class BeanOnStartup implements ApplicationListener<ContextRefreshedEvent> {

    @Override
    public void onApplicationEvent(ContextRefreshedEvent event) {
        // TODO Auto-generated method stub
        trySend();
    }

    public void trySend() {
        RestTemplate restTemplate = new RestTemplate();
        try {
            String str = restTemplate.exchange("http://localhost:8180/test/hello", HttpMethod.GET, null, String.class).getBody();
            System.out.println("here: " + str);
        } catch (Exception e) {
            System.out.println(e.getMessage());
        }
    }
}
